title: Navigate to http://qa.mlbextrabases.com/
custom_preconds: GIVEN the URL http://qa.mlbextrabases.com/ is entered
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the site
custom_expected: the home page is presented

title: Sign into Extra Bases as tester
custom_preconds: GIVEN the URL http://qa.mlbextrabases.com/ is entered
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the site
AND "Sign in" is clicked
AND the tester (MLB_Michael_S) username and password are entered
AND the "Login" button is clicked
custom_expected: THEN the BofA reward page is displayed prompting for sign in with a BofA customer account

title: Sign into Extra Bases as BofA customer
custom_preconds:
NOTE: Security question answers are always as follows.  Text answers are the number "1" without quotes.  Yes/No values are always "Yes."

GIVEN the BofA Reward sign-in page is displayed
custom_steps:
WHEN the customer (awtrkva6vjic8) username and password is entered
AND the "Sign In" button is clicked
AND the security question is answered (if applicable)
AND the option to remember the computer is selected (if applicable)
custom_expected:
THEN you are returned to the Extra Bases home page

NOTE: If you receive the message "Error communicating with credit card provider" this is likely caused by a slow response from BofA's site.  Please reload the page as it will eventually load your account data.

title: Featured Rewards returns data
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Featured Rewards" is displayed in the title bar
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Featured Rewards"
custom_expected: THEN the "Featured Rewards" page is displayed

title: Cash & MLB Gear returns data
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Cash & MLB Gear" is displayed in the title bar
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Cash & MLB Gear"
custom_expected: THEN the "Cash & MLB Gear" page is displayed

title: Tickets returns data
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Tickets" is displayed in the title bar
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Tickets"
custom_expected: THEN the "Tickets" page is displayed

title: Experiences returns data
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Experiences" is displayed in the title bar
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Experiences"
custom_expected: THEN the "Experiences" page is displayed

title: Memorabilia returns data
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Memorabilia" is displayed in the title bar
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Memorabilia"
custom_expected: THEN the "Memorabilia" page is displayed

title: Program Rules (footer) returns data
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Extra Bases homepage is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Program Rules" link
custom_expected: THEN the Program Rules page is displayed

title: Program Rules PDF can be downloaded
custom_preconds: GIVEN the "Program Rules" page is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the image of the PDF
custom_expected: THEN the PDF is downloaded/displayed (vary based on browser/platform)

title: Help Desk link (footer) returns data
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Extra Bases homepage is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the "Help Desk" link is clicked
custom_expected: THEN the "Help Desk" page is displayed

title: Contact Us link (footer) returns data
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Extra Bases homepage is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the "Contact Us" link is clicked
custom_expected: THEN the "Contact Us" page is displayed

title: Confirm Extra Bases logo in upper left returns to the home page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Extra Bases logo is displayed in the upper left
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the logo
custom_expected: THEN the home page is displayed

title: Confirm clicking a team logo displays the team catalog
custom_preconds: GIVEN the home page is displayed with the MLB logo defaulted in the upper left
custom_steps: WHEN clicking a team logo from below
custom_expected: THEN the team's catalog is displayed as indicated by team logo in the upper left

title: Confirm "Browse other team catalogs" link on Featured Rewards, Experiences and Memorabilia pages returns to home
custom_preconds: GIVEN you have navigated to Featured Rewards, Experiences or Memorabilia pages
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Browse other team catalogs" link
custom_expected: THEN the home page is displayed

title: A single item can be added to the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Featured Rewards" has been clicked
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking on an item
AND choosing a date/quantity (where applicable)
AND clicking the "Add to Cart" button
custom_expected: THEN the cart is displayed with the item

title: A single item can be removed from the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item has been added to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the red "Remove" button
custom_expected: THEN the item is removed from the cart

title: Multiple items can be added to the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Featured Rewards" has been clicked
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking on an item
AND choosing a date/quantity (where applicable)
AND clicking the "Add to Cart" button
AND repeating the process for a second item
custom_expected: THEN the cart is displayed with both items

title: Multiple items can be removed from the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN multiple items have been added to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Remove All" button
custom_expected: THEN the items are removed from the cart

title: Multiple quantities of an item can be added to the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Featured Rewards" has been clicked
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking on an item
AND choosing a date/quantity greater than one (where applicable)
AND clicking the "Add to Cart" button
custom_expected: THEN the cart is displayed with the item and correct quantity

title: Multiple quantities of an item can be removed from the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN multiple items have been added to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the red "Remove" button
custom_expected: THEN the item's complete quantity is removed from the cart

title: Confirm the "View Cart" link displays the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the "Featured Rewards", "Cash & MLB Gear", "Tickets", "Experiences", and "Memorabilia" page is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "View Cart" button
custom_expected: THEN the cart is displayed

title: When requesting a greater quantity of an item than permitted, a message is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Baltimore Orioles catalog has been selected
AND the "Memorabilia" page is displayed
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking "Johnny Bench Autographed Baseball with HOF 89 Inscription"
AND entering a quantity of "99"
AND clicking the "Add to Cart" button
custom_expected: THEN the message "The following product is in stock but you have requested more than the maximum allowable quantity: Johnny Bench Autographed Baseball with HOF 89 Inscription. Please lower the quantity or select another item." is displayed

title: When requesting an item with insufficient points, a message is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Baltimore Orioles catalog has been selected
AND the "Experiences" page is displayed
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking "Trip to Spring Training"
AND entering a quantity of "1"
AND clicking the "Add to Cart" button
custom_expected: THEN the message "You attempted to add an item to your cart without a sufficient number of points. Please continue shopping and select another item.." is displayed

title: When items have been added to the cart, the cart point balance reflects the difference
custom_preconds: GIVEN the "Memorabilia" page is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN adding an item to the cart
custom_expected:
THEN the cart will display the remaining points available based on the cart point value

Ex:
ACCOUNT POINTS: 197,234
POINTS FOR ITEMS IN CART: 15
POINTS REMAINING: 197, 219

title: Confirm checkout can be completed
custom_preconds:
NOTE: When checking out, use items with low point values.  The account has a finite number of points and it is difficult to get BofA to add more points to the test account.  Please conserve them.

GIVEN items have been added to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the "Proceed to Check Out" button is clicked
AND the form details are filled out
AND the "Continue Checkout" button is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a confirmation page and order number are displayed

title: Confirm confirmation e-mail is received following checkout
custom_preconds: GIVEN an order has been placed
custom_steps: WHEN checkout is successful
custom_expected:
THEN an e-mail is received
FROM: sportsrewards@extrabases.com
REPLY: sportsrewards@extrabases.com
SUBJECT: MLB Extra Bases Order Confirmation

Sample attached

title: Sign out of Extra Bases
custom_preconds: GIVEN successful login to Extra Bases
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Logout"
custom_expected: THEN the Logout confirmation page is displayed

title: Sign into BofA as BofA customer
custom_preconds: GIVEN the "Cash & MLB Gear" page is displayed
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking on "Enjoy Cash Back"
AND the customer (bacuat_rewards_us) username and password are entered
custom_expected: THEN the BofA cash redemption page will display showing the current point value and last four digits of the account number

title: Confirm point value
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BofA cash redemption page is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN comparing the point value to the Extra Bases site
custom_expected: THEN the values must match

title: Confirm account number
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BofA cash redemption page is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN comparing the last four digits of the account to the Extra Bases site
custom_expected: THEN the values must match

title: Confirm clicking "Rewards Home" returns you to Extra Bases home page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BofA cash redemption page is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Rewards Home" link in the upper right
custom_expected: THEN the Extra Bases home page is displayed
